testsuite.name: com.limac.diffservice.rest.exceptionhandler.ControllerExceptionHandlerSpec

testcase.name: exception handler should handle the MethodArgumentNotValidException and send the ErrorResponseDto with the error message
exception handler should handle the NotFoundException and send the ErrorResponseDto with the error message
exception handler should handle the HttpMediaTypeNotSupportedException and send the ErrorResponseDto with the error message
exception handler should handle the MissingInputException and send the ErrorResponseDto with the error message
